nodes.bodyText: Double quote to prevent globbing and word splitting.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+#!/bin/bash
+
+set -eu
+
+bold="\e[1m"
+bold_green="${bold}\e[32m"
+normal="\e[0m"
+
+function main() {
+  echo -e "[${bold_green}STARTING DATABASE${normal}]"
+
+  runDocker
+  waitForDatabaseToStart
+
+  echo "Deploying schema to lobby_db"
+  pwd
+  "$(dirname "$0")/../gradlew" flywayMigrateAll
+
+  "$(dirname "$0")"/load_sample_data
+  echo -e "[${bold_green}DONE${normal}]"
+}
+
+function runDocker() {
+  echo "Stopping database.."
+  docker stop database || echo "[OK] Database not running.."
+  docker run \
+    --rm  -d \
+    --name="database" \
+    -p "5432:5432" \
+    -v "$(pwd)/$(dirname $0)/sql/init/:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/" \
